case.title: Looking for someone funny..... - 24 (London)
case.text:
Hi,
I'm looking for someone who has a good sense of humor - liking animals and cake would be a bonus too! I'm 24, 5'3, brown hair, blue eyes and i work in IT (Not quite as nerdy and boring as it sounds!) I generally seem to be drawn towards men who have beards - but this is not a necessity!
Message me if you think we'd get on :)
